sentence: Cawthorn is facing a primary against several Republicans, with Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) throwing his endorsement behind Cawthorn's opponent, state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R).
author: Lexi Lonas
title: Photos show Cawthorn wearing lingerie at apparent party: Politico
